name: House of Spirits
description:
A puzzle game about rebuilding ruins.  A prototype with two levels.

Controls: 

Mouse to control game and camera

Space for skip video

Escape for exit 

Made by:

Lucia Mauri (3D models and animation), Jiayu Chen (2D illustrations and UI elements), Matthew Rasmussen (unity, programming and level design) and Sejr Thomsen (unity, narrative and playtesting).
